Member Function Documentation

const void * BtSddbDeOneByteDescriptionType::GetData (   )  const
 

GetData returns a pointer to a memory block where the value data of this data element is stored. How to interpret the content of this memory block depends on the type of the data element.

Returns:
A pointer to void containing the address of a memory block containing the value data for this data element.

void * BtSddbDeOneByteDescriptionType::GetData (   ) 
 

GetData returns a pointer to a memory block where the value data of this data element is stored. How to interpret the content of this memory block depends on the type of the data element.

Returns:
A pointer to void containing the address of a memory block containing the value data for this data element.

virtual UINT8 BtSddbDeOneByteDescriptionType::GetDataElementDescriptor (   )  const [protected, pure virtual]
 

Implemented in BtSddbDeNil, BtSddbDeUint8, BtSddbDeUint16, BtSddbDeUint32, BtSddbDeSint8, BtSddbDeSint16, BtSddbDeSint32, BtSddbDeUuid16, BtSddbDeUuid32, BtSddbDeBoolean, BtSddbDeUint64, BtSddbDeUint128, BtSddbDeSint64, BtSddbDeSint128, and BtSddbDeUuid128.

INT32 BtSddbDeOneByteDescriptionType::GetMemorySize (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

GetMemorySize is used by BtServiceAttribute in conjunction with the service discovery database and returns the size of this data element, if it would be stored in the format the BT-Stack expects.

Parameters:
A UINT32 containing the size of the data element, if it would be stored in the format the BT-Stack expects.

Implements BtSddbDataElement.

void * BtSddbDeOneByteDescriptionType::WriteToMemory (  void *  memory  )  const [protected, virtual]
 

WriteToMemroy is used by BtServiceAttribute in conjunction with the service discovery database and it writes this data element to a memory location in the format the BT-Stack expects.

Parameters:
memory A pointer to void containing the start address of the memory block, where to write this data element to.

Implements BtSddbDataElement.
